name: Super Mario on Scratch 2 Reboot - HTML Port
name_original: Super Mario on Scratch 2 Reboot - HTML Port
description:
This is Super Mario on Scratch 2 Reboot that is now ported to itch.io!

It may take a little while to load.

Here is the game running on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/554258253/

Credits:

@MusicManJoe on Scratch and @xXNunyaXx on Scratch for playtesting

@Brad-Games on Scratch for a bit of the tick code and feedback

@FunnyAnimatorJimTV on Scratch for helping enemy listing code

@BILLGATESFAN on Scratch for helping the clone spawning code and feedback
